resources.string:
WiFi Widget is a demo app that shows how to create a simple Android widget. 

 To see WiFi Widget in action, place the widget on your home screen. On most Android versions, this is done by long-pressing on the home screen, and then selecting to add a widget. 

 When placed on the home screen, WiFi Widget will display an icon, and the device's wifi IP address if connected to a network. 

 Source code is available on GitHub at https://github.com/mobiRic/WifiWidget
Designed and developed by Glowworm Software
